lessons.title: Adding Client-Side Schema Validation
lessons.description: Learn to implement client-side schema validation in a React app with TypeScript and Express, using `busy-bee-schema` to ensure API response integrity and handle CRUD operations efficiently.

lessons.title: Adding Types to Express Responses
lessons.description: Learn how to add comprehensive type safety to Express response objects for better API consistency and reliability.

lessons.title: Adding Types to Express
lessons.description: Learn how to leverage TypeScript with Express to build type-safe APIs and web applications.

lessons.title: Advanced Schema Design with Zod
lessons.description: Zod offers advanced schema design patterns to handle complex validation scenarios effectively.

lessons.title: Advanced Types with Zod
lessons.description: Learn about advanced type constructs in Zod including literals, enums, tuples, unions, discriminated unions, and more.

lessons.title: Branded Types with Express
lessons.description: Learn how to use branded types in Express applications to enhance type safety for IDs, tokens, and other special string values.

lessons.title: Advanced Validation Techniques in Express with TypeScript
lessons.description: Learn how to implement object-oriented validation in Express using class-validator and class-transformer libraries.

lessons.title: Custom Data Transformers with tRPC
lessons.description: Learn how to use data transformers like SuperJSON to properly serialize complex data types in tRPC applications.

lessons.title: Building Type-Safe APIs with express-zod-api
lessons.description: Learn how to use express-zod-api to build type-safe and validated API endpoints by combining Express with Zod schemas.

lessons.title: Validating Request Parameters
lessons.description: Learn how to validate and coerce request parameters into the correct types using Zod schemas, ensuring your path and query parameters are properly parsed as numbers or booleans.

lessons.title: Generating OpenAPI Contracts from an Existing Express API
lessons.description: Learn how to generate OpenAPI specifications from your existing Express API using tools like swagger-jsdoc.

lessons.title: Generating Types from an Open API specification
lessons.description: Learn how to generate TypeScript types from an OpenAPI spec using `openapi-typescript`, creating a type-safe client with `openapi-fetch`, enhancing your API's type safety and developer experience.

lessons.title: Generating Zod Schemas from OpenAPI
lessons.description: Learn how to use `orval` to generate Zod schemas from OpenAPI specifications, enhancing type safety and productivity in your projects.

lessons.title: Global Error Types in Express
lessons.description: Learn how to define and implement standardized error types across your Express application for consistent error handling.

lessons.title: Input Validation with Zod
lessons.description: Use Zod with React Hook Form to create robust, type-safe form validation in your frontend applications.

lessons.title: Introduction to Zod
lessons.description: Get started with Zod, a TypeScript-first schema validation library for ensuring runtime type safety in your applications.

lessons.title: Middleware for Auth & Logging in tRPC
lessons.description: Learn how to implement authentication and logging middleware in tRPC for secure and well-monitored API endpoints.

lessons.title: Type-Safe APIs with OpenAPI and TypeScript
lessons.description: Learn to create type-safe APIs with OpenAPI and TypeScript. Define APIs, generate TypeScript types, and integrate them with Express for consistent, error-free development.

lessons.title: Generate a tRPC Service with Prisma
lessons.description: Learn to create a tRPC service using Prisma with the prisma-trpc-generator. Explore setup options and integrate with Zod, all detailed in this guide.

lessons.title: Refining Types with Zod
lessons.description: A guide to creating and using custom validation schemas in Zod, including refining schemas, custom validation, nested types, branded types, and best practices for error handling and testing.

lessons.title: Structuring Zod Schemas Efficiently
lessons.description: Explore Zod schema structuring tips, focusing on modularization, reuse, type inference, composition, and naming for efficient schema management and maintainable application architecture.

lessons.title: Real-time Subscriptions with tRPC
lessons.description: Learn how to implement real-time updates using tRPC's subscription capabilities with Server-Sent Events or WebSockets.

lessons.title: Testing And Debugging Trpc
lessons.description: tRPC offers a handy createCaller() to directly call your procedures without spinning up an Express server. Combine this with a test DB or mocking:

lessons.title: Testing Express APIs with Zod Fixtures and Superagent
lessons.description: Learn how to effectively test your Express APIs using Zod fixtures for test data generation and Superagent for HTTP request testing.

lessons.title: Testing with Zod: Building Robust and Maintainable Schemas
lessons.description: Learn effective strategies for testing Zod schemas to ensure their correctness and prevent regressions as your application evolves.

lessons.title: Transforms and Coercion with Zod
lessons.description: Master Zod transformations and data coercion to convert, refine, and prepare your data in type-safe ways.

lessons.title: tRPC on the Client
lessons.description: Learn how to set up and use tRPC on the client side with React and React Query integration for type-safe API calls.

lessons.title: tRPC on the Server
lessons.description: Learn how to set up a tRPC server with Express to create type-safe API endpoints with routers, procedures, and contexts.

lessons.title: Type Branding with Zod
lessons.description: Use Zod for type branding to create nominal type relationships while maintaining runtime type safety.

lessons.title: Type Guards vs Schema Validation
lessons.description: Compare traditional TypeScript type guards with schema validation libraries like Zod for runtime data validation.

lessons.title: Type-Safe Async Error Handling in Express Routes
lessons.description: Learn how to use a type-safe wrapper in Express to handle asynchronous route handlers and ensure errors are correctly managed.

lessons.title: Type-Safe Middleware with Express
lessons.description: Add type-safety to middleware when using Express.

lessons.title: Building a Type-Safe Router for Express with TypeScript
lessons.description: Learn to build a type-safe router for Express in TypeScript, ensuring handlers receive correctly typed requests while defining routes with more reliability and clarity.

lessons.title: Type-Safe Route Registration
lessons.description: Discover how to implement type-safe route registration in Express, ensuring handlers receive correctly typed requests for enhanced reliability.

lessons.title: Type Safety Vs. Runtime Validation: Two Sides of the Same Coin
lessons.description: Understand the complementary relationship between TypeScript static type checking and runtime validation with Zod.

lessons.title: Type Stripping in Node.js
lessons.description: Learn how Node.js handles TypeScript files by stripping types at runtime without a separate build step.

lessons.title: Typed-Error Middleware with Express
lessons.description: Add type-safety to Express errors.

lessons.title: Type-Safe Database Access with Prisma
lessons.description: A comprehensive guide to using Prisma with tRPC, Express, and TypeScript for end-to-end type safety in your database operations.

lessons.title: TypeScript Configuration Best Practices
lessons.description: An in-depth guide to configuring TypeScript with strict type checking and other important compiler options for maximum safety and reliability.

lessons.title: Demonstration: Typing Express with Zod
lessons.description: Learn to integrate Zod schema validation in an Express app to ensure data integrity, covering tasks like creation, updates, and database queries with TypeScript.

lessons.title: Adding Types to Headers and Cookies with Express
lessons.description: Learn how to add TypeScript types to headers and cookies in Express for safer HTTP communication, ensuring better type safety in your applications.

lessons.title: Using Zod with Express
lessons.description: Learn how to integrate Zod with Express for type-safe, runtime validation of request bodies, query parameters, and URL parameters.

lessons.title: Validating Path and Query Parameters with Middleware
lessons.description: Learn how to create middleware in Express to validate path and query parameters using Zod schemas for robust request handling. Transform your request validation process with ease.

lessons.title: Validating Schema with Middleware
lessons.description: Learn to create middleware for validating request bodies using Zod schemas in TypeScript, ensuring data integrity for `POST` and `PUT` operations in your Express applications.

lessons.title: Validating the Data Layer
lessons.description: Explore methods to validate your database layer using TypeScript, emphasizing the TaskClient class to perform CRUD operations securely.

lessons.title: Validating the API with OpenAPI
lessons.description: Learn how to ensure your API adheres to specifications using `express-openapi-validator` middleware for request and response validation.

lessons.title: Validating Zod Schemas (Exercises)
lessons.description: Practice your Zod skills with these hands-on exercises that cover schema validation, transformations, and advanced Zod features.

lessons.title: Validating Zod Schemas (Solutions)
lessons.description: Complete solutions for the Zod validation exercises, demonstrating how to implement various validation techniques with Zod.

lessons.title: What is tRPC?
lessons.description: Discover tRPC, a TypeScript-first API framework that enables end-to-end type safety with zero codegen or schema definitions.

lessons.title: Working Backwards from Types
lessons.description: Learn how to create Zod schemas that match existing TypeScript types using the satisfies operator for perfect type alignment.

lessons.title: Best Practices with Zod
lessons.description: Learn best practices with Zod for efficient runtime validation, including avoiding redundant checks, reusing schemas, and optimizing performance in large-scale data scenarios.

lessons.title: Generate Zod Schemas from Prisma
lessons.description: Learn to generate Zod schemas from Prisma using `zod-prisma-types`. Simplify validation by integrating Zod with your Prisma setup effortlessly.

lessons.title: Generating OpenAPI Contracts from Zod Schemas
lessons.description: Learn to generate OpenAPI docs for a TypeScript Express server using Zod schemas, providing clear API metadata and seamless integration with Swagger UI for interactive documentation.
